argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-abs | |- abs = ( x e. CC |-> ( sqrt ` ( x x. ( * ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_absval | |- ( x e. CC -> ( abs ` x ) = ( sqrt ` ( x x. ( * ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_abscl | |- ( x e. CC -> ( abs ` x ) e. RR ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( x e. CC -> ( sqrt ` ( x x. ( * ` x ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_fmpti | |- abs : CC --> RR |
